events.title: Engagement Ceremony
events.description: Exchange of rings to mark the beginning of the wedding.

events.title: Mehndi Ceremony
events.description: Traditional henna application event for the bride and close family.

events.title: Cocktail Party
events.description: Evening party with drinks and music for guests to mingle.

events.title: Wedding Ceremony
events.description: The main wedding event where the vows are exchanged.

events.title: Reception
events.description: Post-wedding celebration with dinner and entertainment.

events.title: Welcome Drinks
events.description: Guests arrive and enjoy drinks while mingling.

events.title: Dinner Buffet
events.description: A lavish buffet with a variety of dishes for the guests to enjoy.

events.title: First Dance
events.description: The newlyweds take the floor for their first dance together.

events.title: Toast and Speeches
events.description: Friends and family make toasts and share speeches to celebrate the couple.

events.title: Dance Party
events.description: The dance floor opens for all guests to enjoy the rest of the evening.
